tit.cmt: oの削除、スペースの挿入しました。

sen.j: 十市瓊入媛命（とおちにいりびめのみこと、生没年未詳）は、崇神天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Toochiniiribime [(十市瓊入媛命) Toochiniiribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown] was a princess of the Emperor Suinin (崇神天皇).
Princess Tochini iribime (Tochini iribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
sen.cmt: oの削除、スペースの挿入しました。
sen.e: Princess Tochini iribime (Tochini iribime no Mikoto; the dates of her birth and death are unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Suinin.
The mother of Princess Toochiniiribime was Owari no Ooshiamhime [(尾張大海媛); it is also pronounced as "Owari no Ooamahime"]
The mother of Princess Tochini iribime was Owari no Oshiamhime.
sen.cmt: oの削除、スペースの挿入しました。
sen.e: The mother of Princess Tochini iribime was Owari no Oshiamhime.

sen.j: 同母兄に八坂入彦命ら。
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko (八坂入彦命) was a maternal brother (son of the Emperor Sujin) of Princess Numakiiribe.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko was a maternal half-brother of Princess Tochini iribime.
sen.cmt: Princess Numaki iribe→Princess Tochini iribime、oの削除、スペースの挿入、同母兄の変更しました。
sen.e: Prince Yasakairibiko was a maternal half-brother of Princess Tochini iribime.

sen.j: 異母兄弟に垂仁天皇、豊城入彦命らがいる。
sen.e: The paternal half brothers of Princess Numakiiribe were The Emperor Suinin (垂仁天皇) and Prince Toyokiiribiko (豊城入彦命).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The paternal half-brothers of Princess Tochini iribime were The Emperor Suinin and Prince Toyokiiribiko.
sen.cmt: Princess Numakiiribe→Princess Tochini iribime、oの削除、スペースの挿入、異母兄の変更しました。
sen.e: The paternal half-brothers of Princess Tochini iribime were The Emperor Suinin and Prince Toyokiiribiko.
The details of her (Princess Toochiniiribime) achievements are unknown.
The details of her (Princess Tochini iribime) achievements are unknown.
sen.cmt: oの削除、スペースの挿入しました。
sen.e: The details of her (Princess Tochini iribime) achievements are unknown.
